messages.content: Create a chart spec for a placeholder budget review that is easy to explain in a meeting. Type: bar.

Here is a compact chart_spec:

chart_spec:
  type: bar
  title: Signal overview for a placeholder budget review
  subtitle: Use: a status check-in
  goal: make the tradeoffs visible
  x_axis:
    label: Step
    categories: [Slice 1, Checkpoint 2, Step 3, Slice 4, Checkpoint 5]
  y_axis:
    label: Value
    unit: points
  legend:
    title: Groups
  series:
    - name: Current
      values: [27, 31, 27, 2.0, 31]
  style:
    variant: clean
    stacking: none
    emphasis: highlight the largest change
  notes: Numbers are synthetic; replace with real values.
